name: Moving Simulator (1GAM)
description:
A silly game I've been working on for the One Game A Month game jam.  I recently moved at the end of June, which served as my inspiration for this game. 

CONTROLS: 

Use W, A, S, and D to move. Use the mouse to look. Jump with the space bar. Pickup and throw furniture with left click.  Move your boxes and furniture to the green loading zone to earn points. 

CREDITS: 

Musical Composition: Jonathan Marlin
Musical Performance: Michael Fewkes
Programming & Game Design: Justin Palmer

Special thank you to the Memphis Game Developers.
